definition.procedurexml: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?><xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block deletable="false" type="event_trigger" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">player_ticks</field><next><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block type="logic_negate"><value name="BOOL"><block type="compare_entities"><value name="a"><block type="entity_none"/></value></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="world_entity_inrange_foreach"><comment h="83" pinned="false" w="191">find all crystallite nether diamond arrows in the area which have landed</comment><value name="_placeholder"><block deletable="false" movable="false" type="entity_iterator"/></value><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"/></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"/></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"/></value><value name="range"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">128</field></block></value><statement name="foreach"><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block inline="false" type="logic_binary_ops"><field name="OP">AND</field><value name="A"><block type="entity_nbt_logic_get"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_iterator"/></value><value name="tagName"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">crystallite_nether_diamond_upgrade</field></block></value></block></value><value name="B"><block type="entity_logic_get"><value name="entry"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">inGround</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_iterator"/></value></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="controls_if"><comment h="80" pinned="false" w="160">Nerf - do NOT apply arrow effects if in water</comment><value name="IF0"><block type="logic_negate"><value name="BOOL"><block type="entity_isinwaterrain_orbubblecolumn"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_iterator"/></value></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="entity_execute_command"><value name="command"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">summon armor_stand ~ ~ ~ {Invisible:1b,ForgeData:{crystallite_nether_diamond_upgrade:1b}}</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_iterator"/></value><next><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block type="math_binary_ops"><field name="OP">GT</field><value name="A"><block type="text_length"><value name="VALUE"><block type="entity_text_get"><value name="entry"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">Potion</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_iterator"/></value></block></value></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="entity_execute_command"><comment h="80" pinned="false" w="160">summon lingering potion with the same effect as the arrow</comment><value name="command"><block type="text_join"><mutation items="3"/><value name="ADD0"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">summon minecraft:area_effect_cloud ~ ~ ~ {Duration:600,DurationOnUse:0,Potion:"</field></block></value><value name="ADD1"><block type="entity_text_get"><value name="entry"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">Potion</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_iterator"/></value></block></value><value name="ADD2"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">",Particle:"minecraft:entity_effect",Radius:3.0f,RadiusOnUse:-0.5f,RadiusPerTick:-0.005f,ReapplicationDelay:20,WaitTime:0}</field></block></value></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_iterator"/></value></block></statement><next><block type="entity_despawn"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_iterator"/></value></block></next></block></next></block></statement></block></statement></block></statement></block></statement></block></next></block><block type="execute_command" x="0" y="675"><comment h="80" pinned="false" w="160">summon invisible armor stand, which causes explosion</comment><value name="command"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">execute as @e[nbt={ForgeData:{crystallite_nether_diamond_upgrade:1b}},nbt={inGround:1b}] at @s run summon armor_stand ~ ~ ~ {Invisible:1b,ForgeData:{crystallite_nether_diamond_upgrade:1b}}</field></block></value><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"/></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"/></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"/></value><next><block type="execute_command"><comment h="80" pinned="false" w="160">despawn arrow</comment><value name="command"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">execute as @e[nbt={ForgeData:{crystallite_nether_diamond_upgrade:1b}},nbt={inGround:1b}] at @s run kill @s</field></block></value><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"/></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"/></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"/></value></block></next></block></xml>
